txt.en:
Craft facilities are fixed objects that can be found throughout the game world. These facilities enable the execution of craft recipes while players stand near enough to gain the benefit of the facility.

You will know that you are within the area of a facility by a light blue icon appearing near your character portrait. This indicates the type of facility that you are near. The appearance of that icon will become familiar in time but, you can always place your mouse pointer over the icon to receive more information about the particular facility that you are near.

As a Cook, you will need to be near an <rgb=#FF00FF00>oven</rgb> or a <rgb=#FF00FF00>camp-fire</rgb> to execute any of your recipes.

<rgb=#FF00FF00>Note: You can double-click on any facility to open your crafting panel.</rgb>
